iso_standards: ISO 5776 (Graphic technology â€” Symbols for text proof correction)

symbols.name: Delete
symbols.description: Strikes through text to be removed.

symbols.name: Substitute
symbols.description: Strikes through and indicates replacement in margin.

symbols.name: Caret
symbols.description: Insertion of character, word, or symbol.

symbols.name: Insert Space
symbols.description: Indicates where a space should be added.

symbols.name: Transpose
symbols.description: Swaps the order of adjacent characters or words.

symbols.name: Move
symbols.description: Arrows indicating moving a block to another position.

symbols.name: Close Up
symbols.description: Removes space between characters or words.

symbols.name: Align
symbols.description: Horizontal or vertical lines for alignment correction.

symbols.name: Highlight
symbols.description: Focus or emphasis on a specific region.

symbols.name: Enclosure
symbols.description: Circle or box around important terms.
